children.description: I am calling the "odds_for_fdj" function with no arguments to fetch the odds for upcoming FDJ matches. By doing so, I will be able to provide the details of the matches, including the team names, dates, and venues. This will help my friends and I in placing our bets on the matches.

Since the previous API call to fetch the odds for upcoming FDJ matches failed with an error message stating that the API doesn't exist, I will now call the "matches_for_fdj" function with no arguments. This function should provide me with the details of the matches, including the team names, dates, and venues. By retrieving this information, I will be able to assist my friends in placing their bets on the matches.

I'm sorry, but it seems that the API for fetching the odds and match details for FDJ is not available at the moment. I am unable to proceed with the task in the current state. I will need to restart and try again later.

Based on the previous action and the current state, it seems that the API for fetching the odds for FDJ matches is not available. In order to proceed with the task, I should try to fetch the details of the upcoming matches using the "matches_for_fdj" function. This will provide the information about the team names, dates, and venues of the matches.

the previous action and the current state, it seems that both the API for fetching odds and the API for fetching match details are not available. Since I am unable to proceed with the task in the current state, I will call the "Finish" function and restart the task.

Based on the previous actions and their outputs, it seems that the "odds_for_fdj" function did not work as expected. To fetch the odds for upcoming FDJ matches, I can try using the "matches_for_fdj" function instead. This function should provide the details of the matches, including the team names, dates, and venues. Let me try calling the "matches_for_fdj" function.

It seems that the "matches_for_fdj" function is not available or does not exist. Since both the "odds_for_fdj" and "matches_for_fdj" functions are not working, I will have to give up and restart the task.

function.name: odds_for_fdj
function.description: This is the subfunction for tool "fdj", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "Latest odds_for_fdj for FDJ"

function.name: matches_for_fdj
function.description: This is the subfunction for tool "fdj", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "Latest matches_for_fdj for FDJ"

function.name: Finish
function.description: If you believe that you have obtained a result that can answer the task, please call this function to provide the final answer. Alternatively, if you recognize that you are unable to proceed with the task in the current state, call this function to restart. Remember: you must ALWAYS call this function at the end of your attempt, and the only part that will be shown to the user is the final answer, so it should contain sufficient information.

final_answer.description: The final answer you want to give the user. You should have this field if "return_type"=="give_answer"

train_messages.content:
You are AutoGPT, you can use many tools(functions) to do the following task.
First I will give you the task description, and your task start.
At each step, you need to give your thought to analyze the status now and what to do next, with a function call to actually excute your step.
After the call, you will get the call result, and you are now in a new state.
Then you will analyze your status now, then decide what to do next...
After many (Thought-call) pairs, you finally perform the task, then you can give your finial answer.
Remember: 
1.the state change is irreversible, you can't go back to one of the former state, if you want to restart the task, say "I give up and restart".
2.All the thought is short, at most in 5 sentence.
3.You can do more then one trys, so if your plan is to continusly try some conditions, you can do one of the conditions per try.
Let's Begin!
Task description: You should use functions to help handle the real time user querys. Remember:
1.ALWAYS call "Finish" function at the end of the task. And the final answer should contain enough information to show to the user,If you can't handle the task, or you find that function calls always fail(the function is not valid now), use function Finish->give_up_and_restart.
2.Do not use origin tool names, use only subfunctions' names.
You have access of the following tools:
1.fdj: Games and pre-game Odds for FDJ

My friends and I are planning to place bets on FDJ matches. Could you please fetch the odds for upcoming matches and also provide the details of the matches? We would like to know the team names, dates, and venues.
Begin!

    "arguments": "{}",
    "function_output": "{\"error\": \"\", \"response\": \"{'message': \\\"API doesn't exists\\\"}\"}",
    "mento-carlo-action-value": 0.0
  }
]

Remember you are now in the intermediate state of a trail, you will first analyze the now state and previous action candidates, then make actions that is different from all the previous.
